wikitext.*:
'''Dimas Caparrós Gómez''' is a Spanish game designer and founder of the (now defunct) Dimassoft. He wrote and designed ''[[El Señor de los Anillos, Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/anillos.html El Señor de los Anillos, Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 8 January 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 2011)</ref>
